EmailTemplate.subject: TriTech Demonstration Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> The Next Generation of Public Safety Technology Registration Confirmation Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Public Safety Professional}},
This is your confirmation that you are registered for the TriTech Software Systems Product Demonstration. We look forward to seeing you at the demonstration.
Date: Thursday, May 9, 2013
Time: 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM - CAD / Mobile Demonstration 12:00 PM to 1:00 PM - Compliimentary lunch will be provided 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM - RMS/FBR and IQ Analytics Demonstration
Address: Jack T. Knueppfer Administration Building 421 North County Farm Road Wheaton, IL 60187 Click here to view map <http://goo.gl/maps/LshqH>
Question? Michelle McClellan TriTech Software Systems (858)799-7900 michelle.mcclellan@tritech.com
